definition: donko shiitake mushroom, a prized type of shiitake (Lentinula edodes) cultivated in winter, with thick flesh and partially open cap

sentences.english: Soak oak mushrooms in water until soften, dice.
sentences.chinese: 将冬菇浸软，然后切成细粒。

sentences.english: The stuffing includes minced pork, prawns , Chinese white cabbage, and diced Chinese mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 馅料包括了猪肉，虾，白菜，冬菇粒。

sentences.english: Soak dried black mushrooms in hot water. Remove stalks . Drain and set aside.
sentences.chinese: 冬菇用热水浸透，去蒂，沥干水份备用。

sentences.english: A： Perhaps I could recommend mushroom soup and clear soup.
sentences.chinese: 也许我可以推荐清炖冬菇和清汤。

sentences.english: Baby Abalone, Scallop, Black Mushroom & Broccoli.
sentences.chinese: 鲍贝，带子，黑冬菇和西兰花。

sentences.english: Bring 2 bowls of water to boil, add mushrooms and broccoli. Simmer for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 煲滚两碗水，放入冬菇及西兰花煮5分钟。

sentences.english: PerhapsI could recommend mushroom soup and clear soup.
sentences.chinese: 也许我可以推荐蒲墩冬菇和清沥。

sentences.english: The noodle should be stir-fried with Chinese dried mushroom, dried shrimps, fried eggs, pork strips and spring onion.
sentences.chinese: 炒粉丝的配料有冬菇，虾米，炒鸡蛋，猪肉条和葱。

sentences.english: Rinse the winter mushrooms, baby sweet corn and vegetarian meat, chop them small dices.
sentences.chinese: 洗净鲜冬菇，珍珠笋及素鸡，切小粒，备用。

sentences.english: Rinse the tofu and shiitake mushrooms. Wipe dry.
Soak mushrooms, remove stalk and dice.
Scallop, Baby Abalone, Black Mushroom & Broccoli.
sentences.chinese: 带子，鲍贝，黑冬菇和西兰花。

definition: variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
